Threat: Nature: Earthquake, major nature disaster destroys server
Countermeasure: We use two database servers stationed in different countries
We use RAID 1 with three disks to prevent data lose. Additionally, we take regular backups and have two database servers in different countries. Lastly, an administrator is on call 24/7.

Threat: Nature: Pollution, dust decreases lifespan of components
Countermeasure: Clean server room every 3 month by specialized cleaning crew

Threat: Gov. Agency: Cleaning staff adds malicious hardware
Countermeasure: Cleaning staff is monitored by iMovies security staff

Threat: System administrator adds malicious hardware component
Countermeasure: Background check on system administrators, employing multiple system administrators
